trans-unit.source: Connect Your Data with Flow| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Connect Your Data with Flow| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Propojte svá data pomocí Flow | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can make your Business Central data available as a data source and specify an OData URL of your web services to build an automated workflow.

seg-source.mrk: You can make your Business Central data available as a data source and specify an OData URL of your web services to build an automated workflow.

target.mrk: Můžete dát své Business Central údaje k dispozici jako zdroj dat a zadat OData URL svých webových služeb a vytvořit tak automatizovaný pracovní postup.

trans-unit.source: Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] in an Automated Workflow

seg-source.mrk: Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] in an Automated Workflow

target.mrk: Používání [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] v automatizovaném pracovním postupu.

trans-unit.source: You can use your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data as part of a workflow in Microsoft Flow.

seg-source.mrk: You can use your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data as part of a workflow in Microsoft Flow.

target.mrk: Svá data [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] můžete použít jako součást pracovního postupu v aplikaci Microsoft Flow.

trans-unit.source: In addition to Microsoft Flow, you can use the Workflow functionality within [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: In addition to Microsoft Flow, you can use the Workflow functionality within [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Kromě Microsoft Flow můžete funkcionalitu pracovního postupu použít i uvnitř [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Note that although they are two separate workflow systems, any Flow template that you create with Microsoft Flow is added to the list of workflow templates within [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Note that although they are two separate workflow systems, any Flow template that you create with Microsoft Flow is added to the list of workflow templates within [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Všimněte si, že ačkoli se jedná o dva samostatné systémy workflow, jakákoli šablona toku, kterou vytvoříte pomocí aplikace Microsoft Flow, bude přidána do seznamu šablon pracovního postupu v rámci [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow](across-workflow.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Workflow](across-workflow.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci [Workflow](across-workflow.md).

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Flow.

seg-source.mrk: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Flow.

target.mrk: Musíte mít platný účet v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a ve službě Flow.

trans-unit.source: To add [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Flow

seg-source.mrk: To add [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Flow

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako zdroj dat ve Flow

trans-unit.source: In your browser, navigate to [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/), and then sign in.

seg-source.mrk: In your browser, navigate to [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/), and then sign in.

target.mrk: V prohlížeči přejděte na web [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/) a přihlaste se.

trans-unit.source: Choose **My Flows** from the ribbon at the top of the page.

seg-source.mrk: Choose **My Flows** from the ribbon at the top of the page.

target.mrk: Z pásu karet v horní části stránky vyberte položku **Moje toky**.

trans-unit.source: There are 2 ways to create a Flow; **Create from template** and **Create from blank**.

seg-source.mrk: There are 2 ways to create a Flow; **Create from template** and **Create from blank**.

target.mrk: Existují 2 způsoby, jak vytvořit Flow; **Vytvořit ze šablony** a **Vytvořit od začátku**.

trans-unit.source: A template is a predefined Flow that has been created for you.

seg-source.mrk: A template is a predefined Flow that has been created for you.

target.mrk: Šablona je předdefinovaný tok, který pro vás byl vytvořen.

trans-unit.source: To use a template, simply select it and create a connection for each service the template uses.

seg-source.mrk: To use a template, simply select it and create a connection for each service the template uses.

target.mrk: Chcete-li použít šablonu, jednoduše ji vyberte a vytvořte připojení pro každou službu, kterou šablona používá.

trans-unit.source: A blank template enables you to create a new Flow completely from scratch.

seg-source.mrk: A blank template enables you to create a new Flow completely from scratch.

target.mrk: Prázdná šablona vám umožňuje vytvořit nový tok zcela od začátku.

trans-unit.source: To Create from blank, on the **My Flows** page, choose the **Create from blank** option.

seg-source.mrk: To Create from blank, on the **My Flows** page, choose the **Create from blank** option.

target.mrk: Chcete-li vytvořit tok z prázdné šablony, vyberte na stránce **Moje toky** možnost **Vytvořit od začátku**.

trans-unit.source: Search for **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** connector.

seg-source.mrk: Search for **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** connector.

target.mrk: Vyhledejte **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** konektor.

trans-unit.source: From the list of available triggers, select one of the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] triggers available:

seg-source.mrk: From the list of available triggers, select one of the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] triggers available:

target.mrk: Ze seznamu dostupných triggerů vyberte jeden z dostupných triggerů [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]:

trans-unit.source: *When a customer approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a customer approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení zákazníka*,

trans-unit.source: *When a general journal batch approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a general journal batch approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení List finančního deníku *,

trans-unit.source: *When a general journal line approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a general journal line approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení řádku finančního deníku*,

trans-unit.source: *When an item approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When an item approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schvalování zboží *,

trans-unit.source: *When a purchase document approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a purchase document approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení nákupního dokladu*,

trans-unit.source: *When a sales document approval is requested*, or

seg-source.mrk: *When a sales document approval is requested*, or

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení prodejního dokladu *, nebo

trans-unit.source: *When a vendor approval is requested*.

seg-source.mrk: *When a vendor approval is requested*.

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení dodavatele*.

trans-unit.source: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant, as well as any conditions in your data that you want to listen for.

seg-source.mrk: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant, as well as any conditions in your data that you want to listen for.

target.mrk: Flow vás vyzve k výběru společnosti ve vašem [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] klientovi, stejně tak k výběru stavu ve vašich datech, která chcete poslouchat.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your flow.

seg-source.mrk: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your flow.

target.mrk: V tomto okamžiku jste se úspěšně připojili k datům Business Central a jste připraveni začít budovat svůj tok.

trans-unit.source: To Create from a template, choose the **Create from template** option.

seg-source.mrk: To Create from a template, choose the **Create from template** option.

target.mrk: Chcete-li vytvořit tok ze šablony, zvolte možnost **Vytvořit ze šablony**.

trans-unit.source: Search for **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** templates.

seg-source.mrk: Search for **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** templates.

target.mrk: Vyhledejte **Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]** šablony.

trans-unit.source: From the list of available templates, select one of the templates.

seg-source.mrk: From the list of available templates, select one of the templates.

target.mrk: Ze seznamu dostupných šablon vyberte jednu z dostupných šablon.

trans-unit.source: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant.

seg-source.mrk: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant.

target.mrk: Flow vás vyzve k výběru společnosti ve vašem [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] klientovi,

trans-unit.source: Because each step in the flow is independent of the next, you may be required to define the company multiple times when using a [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Flow template.

seg-source.mrk: Because each step in the flow is independent of the next, you may be required to define the company multiple times when using a [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Flow template.

target.mrk: Protože každý krok v toku je nezávislý na dalším, budete pravděpodobně muset při použití Flow šablony [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_md.md)] definovat společnost vícekrát.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Flow Documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/flow/getting-started).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the [Flow Documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/flow/getting-started).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci [Dokumentace Flow](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/flow/getting-started).

trans-unit.source: For troubleshooting your Microsoft Flow, see [Troubleshooting Integration with Microsoft Flow](across-troubleshooting-how-use-financials-data-source-flow.md).

target.mrk: Pro poradce při potížích v Microsoft Flow navštivte sekci [Integrace poradce při potížích v Microsoft Flow](across-troubleshooting-how-use-financials-data-source-flow.md).
